event.description: Omar Infante flies out to right fielder Cody Ross.
Yunel Escobar flies out to right fielder Cody Ross.
Garret Anderson walks.
Casey Kotchman singles on a line drive to center fielder Cameron Maybin. Garret Anderson to 2nd.
Jeff Francoeur flies out to right fielder Cody Ross in foul territory.
Kelly Johnson singles on a line drive to right fielder Cody Ross.
David Ross homers (3) on a fly ball to left field. Kelly Johnson scores.
Jordan Schafer flies out to right fielder Cody Ross.
Jair Jurrjens called out on strikes.
Omar Infante flies out to center fielder Cameron Maybin.
Yunel Escobar strikes out swinging.

Pitching Change: Kiko Calero replaces Renyel Pinto, batting 7th.
Defensive Substitution: Ross Gload replaces pitcher Renyel Pinto, batting 9th, playing right field.
With David Ross batting, Kelly Johnson steals (1) 2nd base.
David Ross strikes out swinging.
Brett Carroll remains in the game as the center fielder.
John Baker remains in the game as the catcher.
Jordan Schafer singles on a bunt ground ball to catcher John Baker. Jordan Schafer advances to 2nd, on a throwing error by catcher John Baker.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Greg Norton replaces Rafael Soriano.
Greg Norton grounds out to first baseman Jorge Cantu. Jordan Schafer to 3rd.
